Package oracle.kubernetes.operator.wlsconfig

Class WlsDynamicServersConfig

  • java.lang.Object
    • oracle.kubernetes.operator.wlsconfig.WlsDynamicServersConfig

  • public class WlsDynamicServersConfig
extends java.lang.Object
    Contains values from a WLS dynamic servers configuration, which configures a WLS dynamic cluster

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      WlsDynamicServersConfig​(java.lang.Integer dynamicClusterSize, java.lang.Integer maxDynamicClusterSize, java.lang.String serverNamePrefix, boolean calculatedListenPorts, java.lang.String machineNameMatchExpression, WlsServerConfig serverTemplate, java.util.List<WlsServerConfig> serverConfigs)
      Constructor

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      java.lang.Integer getDynamicClusterSize​()
      Return current size of the dynamic cluster
      java.lang.String getMachineNameMatchExpression​()
      Return the expression used in matching machine names assigned to dynamic servers
      java.lang.Integer getMaxDynamicClusterSize​()
      Return maximum size of the dynamic cluster
      java.util.List<WlsServerConfig> getServerConfigs​()
      Return list of WlsServerConfig objects containing configurations of WLS dynamic server that can be started under the current cluster size
      WlsServerConfig getServerTemplate​()
      Return the server template associated with this dynamic servers configuration
      java.lang.String toString​()

    • Constructor Detail

      • WlsDynamicServersConfig

        public WlsDynamicServersConfig​(java.lang.Integer dynamicClusterSize,
                               java.lang.Integer maxDynamicClusterSize,
                               java.lang.String serverNamePrefix,
                               boolean calculatedListenPorts,
                               java.lang.String machineNameMatchExpression,
                               WlsServerConfig serverTemplate,
                               java.util.List<WlsServerConfig> serverConfigs)
        Constructor
        Parameters:
        dynamicClusterSize - current size of the dynamic cluster
        maxDynamicClusterSize - maximum size of the dynamic cluster
        serverNamePrefix - prefix for names of servers in this dynamic cluster
        calculatedListenPorts - whether listen ports are fixed or calculated based on server index
        machineNameMatchExpression - the expression is used when determining machines to use for server assignments
        serverTemplate - template of servers in the dynamic cluster
        serverConfigs - List of WlsServerConfig containing configurations of dynamic servers that corresponds to the current cluster size
